duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote growth for the consultancy/agency and its global brand partners.
Lead and foster trusted relationships with senior-level clients, along with the Founder and CEO.
Analyze client's business priorities, barriers to growth, and align Vokal's capabilities to create new value.
Identify, review, create, and ensure discipline in methods of ensuring 100% client satisfaction.
Create and execute strategic client plans based on client's strategic priorities and alignment with Vokal's ability to create new value.
Drive the quality of Vokal’s work with solution architect partners, creating exceptional case work for the agency.
Identify capability and resource gaps within the portfolio, and work with resourcing to ensure appropriate staffing.
Focus on the financial success of the portfolio and understand how it contributes to the growth and success of Vokal.
Participate in designing new digital business models & growth pathways, digital experiences, and go-to-market strategies for clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Marketing or related field. Master's degree preferred.
